title: Validate Backport support, If the feature flag was turned on and now off for backend as well. Verify email tarffic coming up, it handles multiple hop configuration gracefully.
custom_steps:
- Enable feature flag
- Add domain with multiple nexthops 
- Disable feature flags in UI an dbackend
- login to settings again.
- Ensure nexthop is not visible as feature flag is disabled but backend have multi nexthop configurations. 
- Try Email traffic and singl enext hop may be use for TCP connection but if that fails then gracefully email is drop with error 421
custom_expected: - Service shouldn't crash when multple nexthops configured and feature flag is disabled.
